info.name: User Management APIs
info.description: User management API used for editing and managing user. This API supposed to be used privately and consumed by BSS and CMS. Only authorization with api key supported

query.description: Return only users which have specified registration state.
Return only users which have specified email.
Page number if the results have more items than items per page. Default = 1.

request.description:
Returns a list of users. Default page size is 100 items.
* **Available since:** 2021-05 (BPLAT-14346)
